directions.dialogText: Use \`jump('a')\` to get frog 'a' to the farthest lilypad to the right.

levels.mission: Use the function \`jump('a')\` to move frog 'a' to the farthest lilypad to the right.
levels.tools: \`jump(letter)\`- The frog with the specified letter jumps to the adjacent lilypad or over one frog if there is an empty lilypad on the other side.
levels.tips: Type \`jump('a')\` twice to move the frog two lilypads over.

directions.dialogText: Use \`jump('a')\` and \`jump('b')\` to get each frog to the farthest lilypad in the direction it's facing.

levels.mission: Use the functions \`jump('a')\` and \`jump('b')\` to move frogs 'a' and 'b' to the farthest lilypads in either direction.
levels.tools: \`jump(letter)\`- The frog with the specified letter jumps to the adjacent lilypad or over one frog if there is an empty lilypad on the other side.
levels.tips: Jump frog 'a' first, then frog 'b', then frog 'a' again.

directions.dialogText: Use \`jump('a')\`, \`jump('b')\` and \`jump('c')\` to get each frog to the farthest lilypad in the direction it's facing.

levels.mission: Use the functions \`jump('a')\`, \`jump('b')\` and \`jump('c')\` to move the frogs to the farthest lilypads in either direction.
levels.tools: \`jump(letter)\`- The frog with the specified letter jumps to the adjacent lilypad or over one frog if there is an empty lilypad on the other side.
levels.tips: You have to start with frog 'c', so type \`jump('c')\` first. Then finish with frog 'b' and frog 'a'.

directions.dialogText: Use \`jump('a')\`, \`jump('b')\` and \`jump('c')\` to get each frog to the farthest lilypad in the direction it's facing.

levels.mission: Use the functions \`jump('a')\`, \`jump('b')\` and \`jump('c')\` to move the frogs to the farthest lilypads in either direction.
levels.tools: \`jump(letter)\`- The frog with the specified letter jumps to the adjacent lilypad or over one frog if there is an empty lilypad on the other side.
levels.tips: You have to start with frog 'b', so type \`jump('b')\` first. Then jump 'c', and finally jump 'a'.

directions.dialogText: Use \`jump('a')\` and \`jump('b')\` to get each frog to the farthest lilypad in the direction it's facing.

levels.mission: Use the functions \`jump('a')\` and \`jump('b')\` to move frogs 'a' and 'b' to the farthest lilypads in either direction.
levels.tools: \`jump(letter)\`- The frog with the specified letter jumps to the adjacent lilypad or over one frog if there is an empty lilypad on the other side.
levels.tips: This one's easy, so you're on your own!

levels.mission: Use the functions \`jump(letter)\` to move the frogs to the farthest lilypads in either direction. Replace the word \`letter\` with the letter above the frog that you want to jump.
levels.tools: \`jump(letter)\`- The frog with the specified letter jumps to the adjacent lilypad or over one frog if there is an empty lilypad on the other side.
levels.tips: Start with frog 'd', the jump 'c', then 'd' again. Keep going in that pattern.

levels.mission: Use the functions \`jump(letter)\` to move the frogs to the farthest lilypads in either direction. Replace the word \`letter\` with the letter above the frog that you want to jump.
levels.tools: \`jump(letter)\`- The frog with the specified letter jumps to the adjacent lilypad or over one frog if there is an empty lilypad on the other side.
levels.tips: Start with the green frogs first.

levels.mission: Use the functions \`jump(letter)\` to move the frogs to the farthest lilypads in either direction. Replace the word \`letter\` with the letter above the frog that you want to jump.
levels.tools: \`jump(letter)\`- The frog with the specified letter jumps to the adjacent lilypad or over one frog if there is an empty lilypad on the other side.
levels.tips: Try to avoid having two frogs of the same color next to each other.

levels.mission: Use the functions \`jump(letter)\` to move the frogs to the farthest lilypads in either direction. Replace the word \`letter\` with the letter above the frog that you want to jump.
levels.tools: \`jump(letter)\`- The frog with the specified letter jumps to the adjacent lilypad or over one frog if there is an empty lilypad on the other side.
levels.tips: First, move as many green frogs as you can without creating a block, then move as many yellows as you can without creating a block. Keep going like that until you're finished.

levels.mission: Use the functions \`jump(letter)\` to move the frogs to the farthest lilypads in either direction. Replace the word \`letter\` with the letter above the frog that you want to jump.
levels.tools: \`jump(letter)\`- The frog with the specified letter jumps to the adjacent lilypad or over one frog if there is an empty lilypad on the other side.
levels.tips: Try to avoid having a frog land behind another frog of the same color.
